author: Karl Rock
description:
While in Bengaluru (formerly Bangalore), I was approached by women claiming to be unable to speak, collecting money for children in a hostel. The story sounded familiar though!

I recorded the interaction, researched similar cases, and looked into what’s really going on. Watch till the end to understand how these donation setups work and how to protect yourself while travelling in India.

#india #scams #scammers #bengaluru #bangalore
title: Inside India’s Street Donation Gangs

author: Karl Rock
description:
In Bengaluru, I was approached by women collecting donations for children’s education. But something felt off. This video shows how the scam operates and how travellers can avoid falling prey to sympathy scams on the streets in India. If you want to help people, donate to registered charities.

title: India's Street Donation Gangs Exposed!
